branchCategory.name: CKZT, Power Clamp Cylinder, w/Manual Hand Lever (NOT SUPPORTED IN THE US)
branchCategory.description: <p>SMC's European standard power clamp cylinder, series CKZT with manual hand lever, was designed with a rounded cover design and release button with minimal protrusion to reduce weld spatter accumulation. <strong><span style="color: #ff0000;">This product is NOT supported in the US.</span></strong></p>
